items.sentence: Did Tom meet the criteria for passing this class?
Did Tom tell you how long it took him to do that?
If they don\'t want this, then what do they want?
If you did that, they\'d kick you out of the bar.
Saint Patrick\'s Day is celebrated on March 17th.
Tom told Mary that he\'d go to Boston in October.
I didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t know how to swim.
Everyone is entitled to be moody once in a while.
Tom stood up and followed Mary out of the office.
Tom suggested that I accompany Mary to the party.
